description: A classic Italian dish made with spaghetti, eggs, cheese, pancetta, and pepper.
steps: Cook spaghetti in salted boiling water until al dente.
In a pan, cook pancetta until crispy.
Whisk eggs and mix with cheese.
Combine hot pasta with pancetta and egg mixture.
Serve with extra cheese and pepper.

description: A popular Indian dish featuring marinated chicken in a spiced tomato sauce.
steps: Marinate chicken in yogurt and spices.
Cook chicken in a pan until browned.
Add onions and tomatoes, simmer until thickened.
Serve with rice or naan.

description: A quick and colorful dish with a variety of vegetables stir-fried in a savory sauce.
steps: Heat oil in a pan.
Add sliced vegetables and stir-fry for 5-7 minutes.
Pour in soy sauce and stir for 2 more minutes.
Serve hot.

description: Flavorful beef tacos with fresh toppings served in crunchy tortillas.
ingredients: Lettuce, cheese, and salsa for topping
steps: Cook ground beef with diced onions until browned.
Fill taco shells with beef and desired toppings.
Serve with salsa.

description: A fresh salad with mozzarella, tomatoes, basil, and a drizzle of balsamic vinegar.
steps: Slice mozzarella and tomatoes.
Layer them on a plate with basil leaves.
Drizzle with balsamic vinegar and serve.

description: Fluffy pancakes perfect for breakfast, topped with syrup or fruits.
steps: Mix dry ingredients in a bowl.
Add milk and egg, stir until smooth.
Pour batter onto a hot griddle, cook until bubbles form.
Flip and cook until golden brown.

description: A refreshing salad with cucumbers, tomatoes, olives, and feta cheese.
ingredients: Olives and olive oil for dressing
steps: Chop vegetables and cheese into bite-sized pieces.
Combine in a bowl and drizzle with olive oil.
Toss gently and serve.

description: A savory fried rice dish packed with shrimp and vegetables.
steps: Sauté shrimp and diced carrot in a pan.
Push to one side, scramble eggs on the other.
Add rice and soy sauce, stir-fry for a few minutes.
Serve hot.

description: Classic cookies filled with gooey chocolate chips, perfect for any sweet tooth.
steps: Cream butter and sugar together.
Add egg and mix well.
Stir in flour and chocolate chips.
Drop spoonfuls on a baking sheet and bake at 350°F (175°C) for 10-12 minutes.

description: A creamy and savory dish made with tender beef, mushrooms, and a rich sauce, served over noodles.
steps: Sauté beef strips until browned, remove from pan.
Add mushrooms and onion, cook until softened.
Stir in sour cream and beef, heat through.
Serve over cooked egg noodles.
